subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Playoff Games
Sports Injuries
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Ottawa defenseman Eric Gryba was suspended two games and Boston’s Andrew Ference for one game for hits to the heads of opponents in playoff openers.
snippet: Ottawa defenseman Eric Gryba was suspended two games and Boston’s Andrew Ference for one game for hits to the heads of opponents in playoff openers.
